UserQuery.name: Sinkoutput
UserQuery.script:
sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		customerID as string,
		Genre as string,
		Age as string,
		address as string,
		effectiveDate as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['outputpowerquery.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Sinkoutput
